reviews.review:
Initially I was a bit skeptical, the controls are limited, and the generator activity is a bit... dull... hitting spacebar to specific timed prompts, lots of exploding generators for the first few hours... lots of dying.

Then I played a monster... couldn't catch anyone, felt kinda stiff and slow.

But I've played it with friends for a month now and after about 15 hours I started to jive with it, and last night as I reached 30 hours and realized I was getting the hang of being the monster... I started to have fun.  I finished a hunt where I the hunter... lost, but the finish was so tight,the escape so narrow, that even defeated I was grinning madly.  

I'm really enjoying this game, I'd definitely recommend you get it in tandem with 3-4 friends, as the ability to help each other makes for a fun party game, and the audioblind Hunter can jump into the audio after a hunt and be like... how do ya like me now!

Es un juego muy adictivo, por que a pesar de que gane el asesino, igual tienes ganancia si hiciste un buen aporte en la partida.
Es mucho mas entretenido con amigos :D
Original concept. Fun gameplay loop. The progression system is also addicting. Cheap DLCs and toxic community. Everything I'm looking for.
Game is really fun, especially if you have friends you can play with. You'll run into bugs occasionally here and there but it's nothing game braking. I would highly recommend this game.

This is a bad game

This game is full of bugs and very exploitable. Over the 1,000 hours I have on this game I can assure you that the devs would rather add Â£10 skins than fix game breaking bugs. Only buy this game if you're depressed and want the inspiration to fucking kill yourself. 

The game has overpowered shit you can bring in before it starts like a free escape for survivors and a free 4 kill for killer. The game is poorly balanced and 99% bugs. The game also stops being horror after like 50h so if that's the reason you want to buy it I would suggest you don't.

TLDR: Don't buy the game it is unbalanced, full of bugs and unless the devs recode the game from the ground up it will always be this way. (Recoding will take years so it's not gonna happen btw)
Nice game kinda stressing some times but has nice charecters and nice idea and its so nice to play with friend. It worths every cent

Se for jogar sozinho jogue de killer.

The game is really nice to play, really entertaining, rich of details and lore, and it is a lot of fun. However, there are a huge LOT of bugs, which is really surprising for such a heavy game in which we invest a lot of money to buy characters and everything - and they are not exactly cheap. Besides bugs on the maps itself, it happened to me that blood points were not accounted by the end of a particularly tough and long match, which was really frustrating. Apart from these points, I really like the game - I have even convinced some friends to buy it so we can all play together.
